Title: An Exemplar of Compassion: Valunei
Description:
It makes my heart ache to see what the decay has done to some of the wildlife here...

I cannot save all the creatures that live around Brackenhide Hollow, but I wish for my trial to at least save some.

In a cave to the west, there is a family of bears that has recently been corrupted. I believe I can fight my way there and heal them. Will you help me, $n?

Objectives.Text: Speak to Valunei in Brackenhide Hollow
